fairySouls.name: The Bank
fairySouls.description: Near the top of the gold pile on top of the bank.

fairySouls.name: The Mayor's House
fairySouls.description: Behind the flames in the fireplace.

fairySouls.name: East Aqueduct
fairySouls.description: In the East Aqueduct.

fairySouls.name: Windmill 1
fairySouls.description: On the 3rd floor of the Windmill.

fairySouls.name: Windmill 2
fairySouls.description: On the sail of the Windmill.

fairySouls.name: Chimney
fairySouls.description: Next to the front chimney on top of the barn.

fairySouls.name: East Mountains
fairySouls.description: Behind the east mountains.

fairySouls.name: West Mountains
fairySouls.description: Inside the water coming from the west mountain.

fairySouls.name: The Root
fairySouls.description: At the lowest point of root at the south of the island.

fairySouls.name: The Pit
fairySouls.description: At the bottom of the obsidian and coal pit.

fairySouls.name: Gravel Quarry 1
fairySouls.description: Above the stairs in the gravel quarry.

fairySouls.name: Gravel Quarry 2
fairySouls.description: On the first level down of wooden slabs in the corner in the gravel quarry.

fairySouls.name: Bones 1
fairySouls.description: On top of the rib bones near the southwest edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: Bones 2
fairySouls.description: Inside a hidden room in the bones. Jump into a hole located at [-286, 94, -179], or jump onto the bone platform at [-276, 93, -180].

fairySouls.name: Bones 3
fairySouls.description: Under a quartz stair in the skull.

fairySouls.name: Bones 4
fairySouls.description: On top of the rib bones near the northeast edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: The Floating Bush
fairySouls.description: Walk over the barrier blocks at [-390, 84, -228]. The fairy soul is in the leaves floating over the void.

fairySouls.name: North Edge
fairySouls.description: Off the north edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: Skeleton Cave
fairySouls.description: Inside of the cave on the north edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: Edge Stairs
fairySouls.description: On the right of a set of stairs leading off the edge of the island. Walk over the green wool.

fairySouls.name: Northern Mountain
fairySouls.description: On top of the northernmost mountain.

fairySouls.name: Bridge 1
fairySouls.description: On the right of the bridge.

fairySouls.name: Bridge 2
fairySouls.description: On the left of the bridge.

fairySouls.name: East Edge 1
fairySouls.description: The easternmost edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: East Edge 2
fairySouls.description: On barrier blocks east of the island.

fairySouls.name: West Edge
fairySouls.description: At the westernmost edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: North Edge 1
fairySouls.description: On the north edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: North Edge 2
fairySouls.description: At the northernmost edge of the island.

fairySouls.name: The Tallest Roof
fairySouls.description: On top of the highest doubled roof.

fairySouls.name: Top of the Mountain
fairySouls.description: At the top of the mountain.

fairySouls.name: In the Flames
fairySouls.description: Behind the flames of the middle hopper on the wall.

fairySouls.name: Edge of the Roof
fairySouls.description: On the edge of the leftmost tower.

fairySouls.name: The Secret Room
fairySouls.description: Go through the tunnel at [-305, 107, -704].

fairySouls.name: Stairs
fairySouls.description: Under the left of the staircase.

fairySouls.name: Glowstone
fairySouls.description: Hidden among the glowstone pockets.

fairySouls.name: Lava River 1
fairySouls.description: In the lava.

fairySouls.name: Lava River 2
fairySouls.description: In the lava.

fairySouls.name: Lava Pool
fairySouls.description: Under the lower block in the pool.

fairySouls.name: The Lever Hole
fairySouls.description: Flip the lever at [-307, 113, -675] and go down the hole to the left.
